recipe.title: Cranberry-Lime Marmalade
instructions: Stir sugar and 1/4 cup water in medium saucepan over medium heat until sugar dissolves. Add all remaining ingredients. Boil until cranberries burst, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes. Cool completely. (Can be made 2 weeks ahead. Store in covered container in refrigerator.)
